item.title: 意大利最大银行 Intesa 首次现货购买比特币
item.description: 意大利最大的银行集团意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA）首次现货购买比特币，购买了价值约 100 万欧元（100 万美元）的原始加密货币。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA has made its first spot Bitcoin purchase, buying roughly 1 million euros ($1 million) worth of the original cryptocurrency, as Italy’s largest banking group pushes deeper into the asset class.】

item.title: 欧洲美元的隐秘历史，第 1 部分：冷战起源
item.description: 在 Apple Podcasts 上收听《Odd Lots》在 Spotify 上收听《Odd Lots》订阅时事通讯【原文：Listen to Odd Lots on Apple PodcastsListen to Odd Lots on SpotifySubscribe to the newsletter】

item.title: 欧洲美元的隐秘历史，第 1 部分：冷战起源（播客）
item.description: 欧洲美元的隐秘历史，第 1 部分：冷战起源（播客）【原文：Hidden History of Eurodollars, Part 1: Cold War Origin (Podcast)】

item.title: 根据桑切斯计划，英国购房者在西班牙将面临 100% 的税收
item.description: 首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）正试图抑制西班牙房地产价格的飙升，而希望在该国购买海滨别墅的英国公民将首当其冲地受到他的一项旗舰政策的影响。【原文：Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez is trying to reign in surging prices for real estate in Spain, and British citizens looking to buy beach houses in the country are set to bear the brunt of one of his flagship policies.】

item.title: 埃及小麦改革为世界贸易的关键部分蒙上阴影
item.description: 埃及对其小麦购买方式的彻底改革使其更难跟踪全球谷物贸易的一个关键环节。【原文：Egypt’s overhaul of the way it buys wheat is making it much harder to follow a key chunk of global grain trade.】

item.title: 印度储备银行行长发出信号：他对更加灵活的卢比持开放态度
item.description: 据熟悉印度央行行长想法的人士透露，印度新任央行行长表示愿意允许卢比与该地区其他国家的货币同步更自由地波动，同时仍将干预外汇市场以抑制过度波动。【原文：India’s new central bank governor has shown a willingness to allow the rupee to move more freely in tandem with peers in the region while still intervening in the foreign-exchange market to curb excessive moves, according to people familiar with the regulator’s thinking.】

item.title: 中国股市连跌六日后反弹，亚洲股市上涨
item.description: 由于有消息称美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的团队正在考虑采取渐进的方式提高关税，中国股市周二在亚洲市场领涨，这提振了市场情绪。【原文：Chinese equities led gains in Asia on Tuesday as news that US President-elect Donald Trump’s team is considering taking a gradual approach to raising tariffs buoyed sentiment.】

item.title: 欧盟开始销售 2025 年债券，提供三种 30 年期债券
item.description: 欧盟将于周二通过银行出售短期和长期债券，为今年上半年筹集 900 亿欧元（950 亿美元）资金迈出第一步。【原文：The European Union is selling short- and long-maturity bonds through banks on Tuesday as it takes the first steps toward raising €90 billion ($95 billion) in the first half of the year.】

item.title: 得益于折扣和优惠活动，Ocado 食品杂货部门销售喜人
item.description: 在通过优惠和折扣吸引了更多顾客之后，Ocado Group Plc 的在线食品杂货部门第四季度的销售额好于预期。【原文：Ocado Group Plc’s online grocery arm recorded better-than-expected sales in the fourth quarter, after luring more customers through deals and discounts.】

item.title: 法国社会党领袖称可能接近与政府达成协议
item.description: 法国社会党党魁奥利维耶-福尔（Olivier Faure）表示，该党可能即将与总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）达成协议，以支持政府换取暂停有争议的养老金制度改革。【原文：France’s Socialist Party may be nearing an agreement with Prime Minister Francois Bayrou in which it would support the government in exchange for the suspension of a contentious reform of the pension system, party head Olivier Faure said.】

item.title: 印度糖料作物遭受病害，贸易商出口希望破灭
item.description: 印度是全球第二大食糖种植国，但由于疾病和去年的干旱天气限制了糖厂的供应，印度的食糖产量低于预期。【原文：Sugar production in India, the second-biggest grower, is trailing expectations as the toll of disease and last year’s dry weather curbs the supply reaching mills.】

item.title: 压力增大，中国重申保持人民币稳定的目标
item.description: 中国人民银行强调其保持人民币稳定的目标，因为在经济放缓的不利因素下，人民币在离岸交易中徘徊在历史最低点附近。【原文：The People’s Bank of China emphasized its goal to keep the yuan stable, as the currency hovers near a record low in offshore trading amid headwinds from a slowing economy.】

item.title: 银行为利洁时家庭护理业务出售准备多达 30 亿英镑的债务
item.description: 银行家们正竞相提供高达 30 亿英镑（37 亿美元）的债务融资，以支持利洁时集团公司（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）家庭护理资产的潜在出售。【原文：Bankers are competing to provide up to £3 billion ($3.7 billion) of debt financing to back a potential sale of the homecare assets of Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc.】

item.title: 阿联酋绿色能源公司计划建造首座与电池相连的太阳能发电厂
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的主要绿色能源生产商正在规划一个项目，将太阳能发电与电池储能连接起来，以提供不间断的电力。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’ main green energy producer is planning a project to link solar power with battery storage to provide uninterrupted power.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀飙升，突破央行容忍范围
item.description: 由于疲软的货币刺激了价格增长并使货币政策变得紧张，匈牙利通胀加速的速度超过了预期，超出了中央银行的容忍范围。【原文：Hungarian inflation accelerated more than forecast to outside the central bank’s tolerance band, as a weak currency fuels price-growth and strains monetary policy.】

item.title: 印度炼油商看到莫斯科找到绕过最新石油限制的途径
item.description: 作为俄罗斯原油的最大进口国，印度的国有炼油厂认为，随着莫斯科找到变通办法，以及特朗普新政府对欧佩克+成员国采取更温和的立场，美国最新制裁措施的影响可能只是暂时的。【原文：State-owned oil refiners in India, the top importer of seaborne Russian crude, believe the impact from the latest US sanctions may be temporary as Moscow finds workarounds, and the new Trump administration takes a softer line against the OPEC+ member.】

item.title: 土耳其财富基金寻求完全展期银团贷款
item.description: 据直接了解此事的人士透露，土耳其主权财富基金正寻求全额展期3月份到期的两年期银团贷款。【原文：Turkey’s sovereign wealth fund is looking to fully roll over its two-year syndicated loan that matures in March, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 需求疲软，中国新增贷款13年来首次下降
item.description: 去年，中国各家银行发放的新贷款出现了自2011年以来的首次下降，这凸显了受通货紧缩和房地产市场低迷困扰的经济对融资需求的疲软。【原文：New loans extended by Chinese banks posted their first decline since 2011 last year, underscoring weak demand for financing in the economy plagued by lingering deflation and a housing slump.】

item.title: 英国石油公司第四季度业绩疲软，推迟发布二月份最新战略报告
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）第四季度业务普遍下滑，产量下降，石油交易疲软。【原文：BP Plc flagged a broad decline across its business in the fourth quarter, with lower production and weak oil trading.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚 2024 年通胀率高于预期，风险加剧
item.description: 罗马尼亚去年年底的通胀率高于央行的预期，因为政治危机和总统选举的重演给前景蒙上了阴影，限制了利率制定者的操作空间。【原文：Romanian inflation ended last year above the central bank’s forecast as a political crisis and a repeat of presidential elections cloud the outlook and limit rate setters’ room for maneuver.】

item.title: 现场直播：英镑和富时 100 指数期货稳定，关注金边债券销售
东欧 340 亿美元销售狂潮中债券风险骤增
item.description: 东欧的主权债券今年开局不利，因为经济和政治风险交织在一起，给这一资产类别带来了沉重的压力。【原文：Sovereign bonds in eastern Europe are having a weak start to the year as a potent mix of economic and political risks weighs on the asset class.】

item.title: 由 Blackstone 支持的印度富人财富管理公司在迪拜开业
item.description: Blackstone 公司支持的 ASK Asset & Wealth Management Group 旗下的私人财富部门在迪拜开设了办事处，以满足印度富裕侨民和希望开发南亚国家市场的国际投资者的需求。【原文：The private wealth arm of Blackstone Inc.-backed ASK Asset & Wealth Management Group has opened a Dubai office to cater for the wealthy Indian diaspora and international investors looking to tap the South Asian country.】

item.title: 中国大型炼油企业抢购石油以避免制裁干扰
item.description: 中国的国有石油公司和大型私营炼油厂正在抢购来自中东和其他地区的原油货物，加快为可能出现的燃料供应中断做好准备，因为对俄罗斯和伊朗的制裁收紧有可能抑制近期的原油流动。【原文：China’s state oil companies and large private refiners are snapping up crude cargoes from the Middle East and elsewhere, hastening preparation for potential disruption in fuel supply as tighter sanctions on Russia and Iran threaten to curb near-term crude flows.】

item.title: 流动性增强在即，印度顶级基金大量购买短期债务
item.description: 印度最大的固定收益基金正在增加整个市场的仓位，为央行今年开始放松货币政策做准备。【原文：India’s biggest fixed-income funds are ramping up positions across the market as they prepare for the central bank to start easing monetary policy this year.】

item.title: 加密银行 Sygnum 募集 5800 万美元，跻身独角兽行列
item.description: 加密货币公司 Sygnum Bank AG 在一轮股权融资中筹集了 5800 万美元，使其估值突破了 10 亿美元大关。【原文：Crypto firm Sygnum Bank AG raised $58 million in an equity funding round, pushing its valuation past the $1 billion mark.】

item.title: 人民币贬值压力增大，中国银行面临现金紧张问题
item.description: 中国捍卫本国货币不受强势美元影响的决心与日俱增，加剧了国内的流动性紧缩，将关键的短期融资利率推升至一年多来的最高水平。【原文：China’s increasing determination to defend its currency against a strong dollar is worsening a liquidity squeeze in the country, pushing a key short-term funding rate to its highest level in more than a year.】

item.title: 削减降息押注，新西兰债券创两个月最大跌幅
item.description: 由于货币疲软和商业景气改善，新西兰储备银行下个月再次大幅降息的预期被削弱，新西兰债券创下两个月来最大跌幅。【原文：New Zealand bonds slumped the most in two months as currency weakness and improving business sentiment saw expectations of another large Reserve Bank of New Zealand interest rate cut next month trimmed.】

item.title: 据说 Grab 支持的超级银行考虑今年在雅加达上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼超级银行正在考虑首次公开募股，最快可能于今年在雅加达举行。【原文：Super Bank Indonesia is considering an initial public offering that may take place in Jakarta as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 I Squared Capital 即将对香港宽频提出收购要约
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，I Squared Capital 正逐步接近对香港宽带有限公司（HKBN Ltd. ）的收购要约，有可能引发与中国移动有限公司（China Mobile Ltd. ）对这家香港上市宽带提供商的竞购战。【原文：I Squared Capital is edging closer to a buyout offer for HKBN Ltd., people familiar with the situation said, potentially setting up a bidding war with China Mobile Ltd. for the Hong Kong-listed broadband provider.】
